text: niṅṅaḷ ī rājyatt tāmasikkukayuṁ iviṭe niṅṅaḷkk iṣṭamuḷḷēṭatt ninn tinnukayuṁ ceyt keāḷḷuka. niṅṅaḷ pāpamēācanattin prārt'thikkukayuṁ, talakunicc keāṇṭ paṭṭaṇavātil kaṭakkukayuṁ ceyyuka. eṅkil niṅṅaḷuṭe teṟṟukaḷ niṅṅaḷkku nāṁ peāṟuttutarunnatāṇ‌. salkarm'makārikaḷkk vaḻiye nāṁ kūṭutal keāṭukkunnatumāṇ enn avarēāṭ paṟayappeṭṭa sandarbhavuṁ (ōrkkuka)
